paragraph: Since our establishment in 2009, we have been restlessly advancing as a leading solar company that focuses on eco-friendly recycling of photovoltaic products.
To be more specific, FineEco specializes in producing chip polysilicons, recycling polysilicons, wafers and cells, as well as trading polysilicon ingots and wafers.
Not only do we possess an unequaled chip poly cleaning technology but also are in partnerships with global corporations.
Dedicated to producing and promoting reliable green energy, we will continue to move forward to become the world-renowned company with the best technology and unquestionable trust of our customers.
letter.name: ST Baik

history.2: Been outsourcing semiconductor toll manufacturing for SK Hynix
history.3: Been performing cleaning toll manufacturing for SKC Solmics
history.5: Awarded KITA Award for One Million Dollar Exportation
history.6: Entered into MOU with MEMC, USA
history.7: Gained certification for general waste treatment
history.10: Been subcontracting for Samsung Electronics semiconductor plants
history.11: Awarded KITA Award for Three Million Dollars Exportation
